abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "Country is Brazil", "OccurrenceStatus is Present", "TaxonKey is Minaria T.U.P.Konno & Rapini" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Herbarium Berolinense, Berlin (B) 1 records from CVRD - Herbário da Reserva Natural Vale 1 records from BOTU - Herbário Irina Delanova Gemtchújnicov 1 records from HUTO - Herbário da Universidade de Tocantins 1 records from HST - Herbário Sérgio Tavares 1 records from FURB - Herbário Dr. Roberto Miguel Klein 1 records from CNMT - Herbário Centro Norte Mato Grossense 1 records from Herbarium specimens of Université de Montpellier 2, Institut de Botanique (MPU)) 1 records from IRAI - Herbário do Parque da Ciência Newton Freire Maia 1 records from CGMS - Herbário da Fundação Universidade Federal de Mato Grosso do Sul 1 records from UESC - Herbário Universidade Estadual de Santa Cruz 1 records from JOI - Herbário Joinvillea 1 records from University of Vienna, Institute for Botany - Herbarium WU 1 records from SPSF - Herbário Dom Bento José Pickel 1 records from Herbario Nacional Colombiano (COL) 1 records from HJ - Herbario Jataiense 2 records from MAR - Herbário do Maranhão 2 records from MBML-Herbario - Herbário Mello Leitão 2 records from Caatinga Biome - RB - Rio de Janeiro Botanical Garden Herbarium Collection 2 records from HUEG - Herbário da Universidade Estadual de Goiás 2 records from Arizona State University Vascular Plant Herbarium 2 records from HPL - Herbário do Jardim Botânico Plantarum 2 records from SJRP - Herbário de São José do Rio Preto 2 records from PACA-AGP - Herbarium Anchieta 2 records from FLOR - Herbário do Departamento de Botânica da Universidade Federal de Santa Catarina 2 records from FCAB - Herbário Friburguense 2 records from Natural History Museum (London) Collection Specimens 3 records from CSIC-Real Jardín Botánico-Colección de Plantas Vasculares (MA) 3 records from HUESB - Herbário da Universidade Estadual do Sudoeste da Bahia 3 records from Carnegie Museum of Natural History Herbarium 3 records from Instituto de Botánica Darwinion 3 records from ICN - Herbário do Instituto de Ciências Naturais 3 records from VIES - Herbário Central da Universidade Federal do Espírito Santo 3 records from HUCS - Herbário da Universidade de Caxias do Sul 3 records from Field Museum of Natural History (Botany) - Historical Photographs of Type Specimens from Berlin (B) 3 records from FUEL - Herbário da Universidade Estadual de Londrina 4 records from Harvard University Herbaria: All Records 4 records from Plant Resources Center 4 records from IPA - Herbário - IPA Dárdano de Andrade Lima 4 records from International Barcode of Life project (iBOL) 4 records from HUFSJ - Herbário da Universidade Federal de São João del-Rei 4 records from VIC - Herbário da Universidade Federal de Viçosa 5 records from Royal Botanic Garden Edinburgh Herbarium (E) 5 records from HCF - Herbário da Universidade Tecnológica Federal do Paraná Campus Campo Mourão 5 records from HDJF -
